text: José Asensio Lamiel (29 January 1924 – 26 August 2020) was an Aragonese painter and sculptor. He was born in Calanda, Spain. He studied at the San Carlos Royal Academy of Fine Arts in Valencia. In the 1960s he moved to Colombia and worked there for six years. He also worked in the United States, before returning to Spain. In 1989 he was awarded the Cruz de San Jorge by the provincial government of Teruel. Lamiel died on 26 August 2020 in Alcalá de Henares, Spain at the age of 96.El pintor y escultor calandino José Lamiel fallece a los 96 años de edad ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish painters Category:Spanish sculptors Category:20th-century artists Category:21st-century artists
title: José Lamiel
